short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We're all busy but often stumble on great websites! Use Bookie to bookmark pages to open them when most convenient for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What if bookmarks are created with a date and time that is convenient for you to visit them? Bookie let's you do just that, just set and forget! This extension has been developed for academics, researchers, writers and productivity fanatics!

Key Features:

Automatic page launch
When the date and time is matched, a new tab will open with the URL that was bookmarked for reading. Don't lift another finger nor think about the page again, keep focused on your current tasks.

Safe bookmark storage
Bookmarks are stored locally within your Chrome browser and the extension only relies on your local time to decide when to launch a page. A dedicated tab maintains this list and allows you to view all saved bookmarks.

Simple UI
Automatic page title insertion, only enter the date and time then hit 'Save' to schedule!

Be sure to share with your friends and colleagues. Leave feedback, request features and support the project to help it get better! 

Change Log.

Update. Version: 0.3
- UI update improving look, feel and ease of use.
- New quick set feature, allowing you to set a bookmark to open in 5, 15 or 30 minutes.

Update. Version: 0.2
- Fixed support button 
- Display scheduled date consistent with UI date
- Updated notification text
- Prevented historical date and time being set
- Added feedback email link

First Release. Version: 0.1
- Simple UI integrated with the Google Chrome browser to quickly bookmark your favourite web pages with a date and time.
- Full list of bookmarks are stored and viewable in a dedicated tab.
- Delete all bookmarks in a single click.
- A notification is shown to the user on successful page open.
